byline.contributor: Falih Hassan contributed reporting from Tikrit, and Omar Al-Jawoshy from Baghdad.

abstract: Iraqi officials insist they are making progress in offensive against Tikrit, Iraq, although front line has not significantly moved and some members of military say Islamic State militants still control most of city.
lead_paragraph: There is evidence that Islamic State forces are more numerous in Tikrit than previously revealed by the Iraqi government.

headline.main: Islamic State’s Grip on City Appears Firmer Than Iraqis Acknowledge
headline.print_headline: Islamic State’s Grip on City Appears Firmer Than Iraqis Acknowledge

snippet: There is evidence that Islamic State forces are more numerous in Tikrit than previously revealed by the Iraqi government.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
